heroContent.heroDescriptions: Over the past 5 years I have been working with React, JavaScript and Typescript, developing libraries and SPA that incorporate different Micro Front Ends. I am committed to collaboration and solution oriented problem solving. As a Full Stack Developer, I worked with PHP language and frameworks such as Laravel and Symfony, along with Relational Databases. My expertise also extends to Agile methodologies, Version Control Systems and CI/CD processes. I enjoy learning new technologies.
